items.title: Texas A&M System declines to reinstate fired lecturer despite faculty panel’s findings
bullets: • Melissa McCoul was fired in September after a video of her teaching about gender identity in a children’s literature class went viral
• A faculty appeals panel unanimously concluded that her dismissal was not justified
• The university system deferred the decision to the university system
• McCoul's attorney confirmed to The Texas Tribune that this sequence of events occurred

• Economists say this will drive housing costs up, even as Texas officials focus on bringing such costs down

• It is among the last undisturbed tracts of land on almost 70 miles of shoreline

items.title: How Much Melatonin Should You Be Taking? (2026)
bullets: • Melatonin is the hormone your brain produces naturally as part of its circadian rhythm
• Your pineal gland is in charge of making it, and sunlight signals it to slow down production
• Though your brain is already producing melatonin, the idea of taking a supplement is that it jump-starts your sleep cycle

items.title: Nepal to scrap 'failed' Mount Everest waste deposit scheme
bullets: • Nepal to scrap 'failed' Mount Everest waste deposit scheme to encourage climbers to bring their waste down from Mount Everest
• Climbers had been required to pay a deposit of $4,000 (£2964) if they brought at least 8kg (18lbs) of waste back down with them
• But after 11 years - and with the rubbish still piling up - the scheme is being shelved because it "failed to show a tangible result"
